summary: This bill, the Restoring State Mineral Revenues Act, amends the Mineral Leasing Act to eliminate an administrative fee. It specifically modifies certain sections of the Act (30 U.S.C. 191) and makes conforming amendments to related legislation, including the Mineral Leasing Act for Acquired Lands and the Geothermal Steam Act of 1970. The changes aim to adjust how mineral revenues are managed and distributed.
